text.textblock: 1. The authority citation for 20 CFR part 655 continues to read as follows:
Section 655.0 issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H) (i) and (ii), 1182 (m) and (n), 1184, 1188, and 1288(c); 29 U.S.C. 49
Section 655.00 issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H)(ii), 1184, and 1188; 29 U.S.C. 49
Subparts A and C issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H)(ii)(b) and 1184; 29 U.S.C. 49
Subpart B issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H)(ii)(a), 1184, and 1188; and 29 U.S.C. 49
Subparts D and E issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H)(i)(a), 1182(m), and 1184; 29 U.S.C. 49
Subparts F and G issued under 8 U.S.C. 1184 and 1288(c); and 29 U.S.C. 49
Subparts H and I issued under 8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(15)(H)(i)(b), 1182(n), and 1184; 29 U.S.C. 49
Subparts J and K issued under 29 U.S.C. 49
2. In 20 CFR 655.310, by adding a parenthetical, as follows, at the end of the regulatory text:
(Approved by the Office of Management and Budget under control number 1205-0305.)
3. In 20 CFR 655.360, by adding a parenthetical, as follows, at the end of the regulatory text:
(Approved by the Office of Management and Budget under control number 1205-0305.)
4. The authority citation for title 29 CFR part 504, subparts D and E, continues to read as follows:
5. In 29 CFR 504.310, by adding a parenthetical, as follows, at the end of the regulatory text:
(Approved by the Office of Management and Budget under control number 1205-0305.)
6. In 29 CFR 504.350, by adding a parenthetical, as follows, at the end of the regulatory text:
(Approved by the Office of Management and Budget under control number 1205-0305.)
The following appendix will not appear in the Code of Federal Regulations.
